page.title: 15A JOURNEY ON THE RAILWAY
page.content: The Brecon Mountain Railway runs from Pant to Pontsticill,the track itself extends two and a half miles along the side of a wooded valley with excellent views towards Pen_y_fan and Corn Du in the Brecon Beacons.The train moves along quite slowly which enables one to enjoy the scenery on the twenty_five minute journey.At Pontsticill there is a cafe which sells refreshments from a converted railway carriage.The main visitor area is at Pant where the engine house,cafeteria,gift shop andbooking office are situated.The cost of the ticket is quite expensive for the length of journey but Mr. Hills is hoping to extend the railway in the near future and needs funds to do so.
